item.description: Global Day of Coderetreat by swkWien at Nagarro A day of deliberate practice and learning. TODO: Schedule Code of Conduct Mindset Dinner Thx nagarro Feedback form Join SWK Facilitators (in order of appearance) …
Kata ğŸ Snake Game TODO: Describe Kata …
Session 1 Pen and Paper Facilitator: Claus Aichinger ğŸ¤ Find a Pair ğŸ“ Pen & Paper ğŸ¤” Retrospective â˜• Enjoy the Break

Session 2 First attempt to make small steps Facilitator: Peter Kofler, @codecopkofler TDD with Ping Pong Let’s do TDD and Pair Programming in a strict way, switching after each increment: A writes a test and sees that it fails. B writes the code needed to pass the test. A (or B) refactors the code as needed. B writes next test and sees that it fails. A writes the code needed to pass the test.

Session 3 Make Even Smaller Steps! Facilitator: Paul Rohorzka, @paulroho Take Baby Steps! Why Should I Take Baby Steps? Your ğŸ§ is limited A free mind works better Ingeniuity seldom works Steady progress feels great TDD Baby Steps Flow Choose a step Set timer Code! ğŸ¤“ Works? â†’ Repeat â² Time out? reset --hard Make the step smaller! â†’ Repeat But How Small?
Session 4 Minimalist Coder Facilitator: Rea Sutter ğŸ¤ Find a Pair ğŸ“ Minimalist Coder ğŸ¤” Retrospective â˜• Enjoy the Break
